data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Bremen, Germany to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bremen, Germany
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bremen, Germany.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 50 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Bremen, Germany.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, please raise up prophets in Bremen who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Bremen, Germany to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 647,909 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Urdu people might believe through him.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Bremen to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, move the 13,791 believers in the state of Bremen to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Bremen, Germany will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

location.name: Bremen
